10.2 Invoking the editor and displaying files

10.2.3 The editor window's context: the active project

In an editor window, the toolbar and menu commands act upon the application of the active project. For instance, the Project, Build, and Application menus are not available in the editor if the source file being edited is not part of the active project--the project whose name is visible in the main window's drop-down list. See "The active project" on page 119 for more details.

Getting Started with Functional Developer - 31 MAR 2000
